tiny proxy is not working: can someone help me configure tinyproxy?
I'm "getting the proxy is refusing connections" from ff when I access it from 172.168.0.3 (I am on 172.168.0.2)
HELLO?
is 172.168.0.0 your LAN addressing scheme?
yes
but I have static IPs
well that could be your problem -- 172.168.0.0 is not for private/LAN use, it is a public address range -- you should change that to use addresses within the range of - 172.16.0.0 - 172.32.255.255
I didn't realise, I thought it was private
and this is an educated guess - your proxy server is denying connections to it because it thinks traffic is originating from out on the internet rather than your LAN
I've just set it all up so that it's 193. etc and it still doesn't work
is gone
193.x.x.x is also public -- use one of 10.x.x.x, 172.16.x.x-172.32.x.x or 192.168.x.x
I'm now on 172.168.0.2 and it's working! thanks so much
you werent listening.. you are bound to bump into other problems if you continue using that address range
sorry, I meant 172.16.0.2
